ASK_STYLE: A blend of Van Gogh’s impasto brushwork and Studio Ghibli’s soft, dreamlike atmosphere, with swirling starry skies and gentle, flowing lines.

    "HISTORICAL_CONTEXT": "Modernist expressionism (Van Gogh) fused with contemporary Japanese animation aesthetics (Studio Ghibli); rooted in emotional expression and visual storytelling."
  },
  "MERGE_STRATEGY": "Blend Van Gogh’s textural intensity and expressive brushwork with Ghibli’s compositional calm and atmospheric softness by maintaining dynamic forms while smoothing transitions and enhancing luminous, gentle lighting.",
  "PROMPT_SNIPPET": "A swirling starry sky with thick, expressive brushstrokes and soft, dreamlike lighting, combining Van Gogh’s impasto energy with Studio Ghibli’s serene, flowing atmosphere.",

    "No sharp, rigid lines or mechanical precision",
    "Avoid harsh contrasts or cold, desaturated tones",
    "No overly detailed realism or hyper-realistic textures"
  ],
  "EVALUATION_CRITERIA": [
    "Presence of visible impasto textures and swirling motion",
    "Soft, glowing color transitions with warm and cool tonal balance",
    "Flowing, organic forms without mechanical or geometric rigidity",
    "Atmosphere of calm wonder and emotional warmth"
  ],
  "CONFIDENCE": 0.97
}
